snippet: The Food and Drug Administration on Monday proposed new regulations for tanning beds that would require their makers to affix labels warning young people not to use them.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration proposes new regulations for tanning beds that will require manufacturers to affix labels warning young people not to use them; says it is first step toward potentially restricting access to the beds altogether for minors.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration on Monday proposed new regulations for tanning beds that would require their makers to affix labels warning young people not to use them.

headline.seo: New Rules Proposed for Tanning Beds
headline.main: New Rules Proposed for Tanning Beds
headline.print_headline: New Rules Proposed For Tanning Beds
